author: UIUX Lab
name: fullstack-nextjs-app-template
description: A full-stack sample web application based on Next.js that creates a simple whole-website architecture.

scripts.dev: EXPORT_ENABLED=false NODE_ENV=development node server.js & node backend/server-php.js
scripts.build: cross-env SKIP_BUILD_STATIC_GENERATION=true NODE_ENV=production node scripts/download-remote-files-from-API.js & cross-env SKIP_BUILD_STATIC_GENERATION=true EXPORT_ENABLED=false NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.build:static: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/download-remote-files-from-API.js & cross-env NODE_ENV=production EXPORT_ENABLED=false next build
scripts.start: EXPORT_ENABLED=false NODE_ENV=production node server.js & node backend/server-php.js
scripts.export: cross-env EXPORT_ENABLED=true next build && node scripts/publishing-to-platform.js
scripts.destroy: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.js & pm2 delete ecosystem.config.js
